code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';import{numberWithCommas}from'../utils/format';export var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=amounts.filter(function(item){return item>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);var expense=amounts.filter(function(item){return item<=0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0*-1).toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inc-exp-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:" Income "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"money plus",children:[" $",numberWithCommas(income)," "]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:" Expense"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"money  minus",children:[" $",numberWithCommas(expense)," "]})]})]});};
